TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGrid extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector

summary.span: 表示用于在可自定义的网格中显示数据的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供了一种灵活的方式来显示行和列中的数据集合。The control provides a flexible way to display a collection of data in rows and columns. 包括内置列类型和用于承载自定义内容的模板列。The includes built-in column types and a template column for hosting custom content. 内置行类型包括下拉详细信息部分，可用于显示单元值下面的附加内容。The built-in row type includes a drop-down details section that you can use to display additional content below the cell values. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 若要将绑定 到数据，请将 属性设置为 实现。To bind the to data, set the property to an implementation. 数据网格中的每一行都绑定到数据源中的某个对象，数据网格中的每一列都绑定到该数据对象的属性。Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object. 为了使 用户界面在源数据中添加或删除项时自动更新， 必须将绑定到实现接口的集合 ，例如 。In order for the user interface to update automatically when items are added to or removed from the source data, the must be bound to a collection that implements the interface, such as an . 若要自动反映属性更改，源集合中的对象必须实现 接口。To automatically reflect property changes, the objects in the source collection must implement the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ (WPF) 的数据绑定 ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf)。For more information, see [Data Binding (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf). ## 列Columns 默认情况下， 当设置属性时，控件将自动生成列 。By default, the control generates columns automatically when you set the property. 所生成的列的类型取决于列中数据的类型。The type of column that is generated depends on the type of data in the column. 下表列出了生成的列类型。The following table lists the generated columns types. |生成的列类型Generated Column Type|数据类型Data Type| |---------------------------|---------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| 下图显示了每个列类型。The following illustration shows each of the column types. ![具有全部四种默认列类型的数据网格](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "具有全部四种默认列类型的数据网格")![DataGrid with all four default column types](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid with all four default column types") 自动生成列后，您可以处理 事件以自定义或取消列，然后将其添加到中 。When columns are auto-generated, you can handle the event to customize or cancel columns before they are added to the . 如果将用户定义的列和自动生成的列添加到，则 先添加用户定义的列。If you add both user-defined columns and auto-generated columns to the , the user-defined columns are added first. 若要重新排列列的显示顺序，可以 为各个列设置属性。To rearrange the display order of the columns, you can set the property for individual columns. 可以通过将属性设置为来阻止自动生成列 `false` 。You can prevent automatic column generation by setting the property to `false`. 如果要显式创建和配置所有列，这很有用。This is useful if you want to create and configure all columns explicitly. 如果内置列类型不能满足您的需要，请使用类型来定义自定义列。Use the type to define a custom column if the built-in column types do not meet your needs. 类型提供 和 属性，使你能够为显示模式和编辑模式指定内容模板。The type provides and properties that enable you to specify content templates for both display and editing modes. 例如，您可以为日期定义自定义列。For example, you could define a custom column for dates. 可以定义 来显示日期，并 可以定义 控件来编辑日期。The could define a to display a date, and the could define a control to edit the date. 您可以使用该 集合以编程方式在运行时添加、插入、删除和更改控件中的任何列。You can use the collection to programmatically add, insert, remove, and change any columns in the control at run time. 检查 属性以确定是否自动生成列或用户定义的列。Check the property to determine whether a column is auto generated or user defined. 更改时，自动生成的列将自动添加、删除或重新生成 。Auto-generated columns will be automatically added, removed, or regenerated when the changes. ## 选择Selection 默认情况下，当用户单击中的单元格时，将选择整行， 用户可以选择多个行。By default, the entire row is selected when a user clicks a cell in a , and a user can select multiple rows. 您可以设置 属性，以指定用户是否可以选择单元格、整行或同时选择两者。You can set the property to specify whether a user can select cells, full rows, or both. 将 属性设置为指定是否可以选择多个行或单元，或者只选择单个行或单元格。Set the property to specify whether multiple rows or cells can be selected, or only single rows or cells. 可以从属性中获取有关所选单元格的信息 。You can get information about the cells that are selected from the property. 您可以获取有关在事件中的选定内容已更改的单元格的信息 。You can get information about cells for which selection has changed in the of the event. 调用 或 方法以编程方式选择或取消选择所有单元格。Call the or methods to programmatically select or unselect all cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [DataGrid 控件中的默认键盘和鼠标行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Behavior in the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control). ## 分组、排序和筛选Grouping, Sorting, and Filtering 默认情况下，您可以 通过单击列标题对中的项进行排序。By default, you can sort items in a by clicking the column header. 可以通过处理事件自定义排序 。You can customize sorting by handling the event. 若要取消默认排序，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the default sort, set the property to `true`. 你还可以对源数据进行排序，然后将其显示在中 。You can also sort the source data before it is displayed in the . 若要对中的数据进行分组、排序和筛选， 请将绑定 到 支持这些操作的实现。To group, sort, and filter data in the , you bind the to an implementation that supports these operations. 然后，对集合视图执行操作。You then perform the operations on the collection view. 当项在中分组后 ，您可以定义一个 指定每个组的外观的。When items are grouped in the , you can define a that specifies the appearance of each group. 您可以 通过将其添加到的 集合来应用 。You apply the by adding it to the collection of the . 如果有多个级别的分组，则可以对每个组级别应用不同的样式。If you have multiple levels of grouping, you can apply different styles to each group level. 样式按其定义顺序进行应用。Styles are applied in the order in which they are defined. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 DataGrid 控件中对数据进行分组、排序和筛选](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control)。For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control). ## 正在编辑Editing 默认情况下，你可以直接在中编辑项 。By default, you can edit items directly in the . 为了保证可以正确提交和取消编辑，中的对象 必须实现 接口。To guarantee that edits can be committed and canceled correctly, the objects in the must implement the interface. 或者，可以将属性设置 为， `true` 以在中禁用编辑 。Alternatively, you can set the property to `true` to disable editing in the . 对 以下编辑命令提供内置支持：The has built-in support for the following editing commands: |CommandCommand|默认输入绑定Default Input Binding| |-------------|---------------------------| ||F2F2| ||ESCESC| ||EnterENTER| ||DELETEDELETE| 通过单击或按 F2，将当前的单元格置于编辑模式。You put the current cell into edit mode by clicking it or pressing F2. 当您移动到同一行中的另一个单元格，或在单元格处于编辑模式时按 ENTER 键时，将提交单元格级别的编辑。A cell-level edit is committed when you move to another cell in the same row or press ENTER while the cell is in edit mode. 如果行处于编辑模式，则在移到另一行或按 ENTER 键时，将提交行中的所有编辑。All edits in a row are committed when you move to another row or press ENTER while the row is in edit mode. 您可以通过按 ESC 一次来取消单元格编辑，并通过按 ESC 两次取消行中的所有编辑。You cancel a cell edit by pressing ESC one time, and cancel all edits in a row by pressing ESC two times. 有关以编程方式提交和取消编辑的详细信息，请参阅 、 和 方法。For more information about programmatically committing and canceling edits, see the , , and methods. 有关编辑相关事件的详细信息，请参阅 、 、 和 。For more information about edit-related events, see , , , and . 设置 和 属性以指定用户是否可以添加或删除行。Set the and properties to specify whether a user can add or delete rows. 用户可以通过按 DELETE 键删除选定行。A user can delete selected rows by pressing the DELETE key. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则会将新的项行添加为中的最后一行 。If the property is set to `true`, a new item row is added as the last row in the . 可以通过处理事件来设置新项的默认值 。You can set default values for new items by handling the event. > [!NOTE] > 是否允许编辑操作受到各种其他因素的影响，这些因素包括的 和 状态 ，以及基础数据集合是否允许操作。Whether editing actions are allowed is influenced by a variety of additional factors, including the and state of the , and whether the underlying data collection allows the action. ## 验证Validation 使您能够在单元和行级别执行验证。The enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level. 使用单元格级验证时，可以在用户更新值时验证绑定数据对象的各个属性。With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value. 通过行级验证，用户将更改提交到行时，可以验证整个数据对象。With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row. 您可以通过设置属性为行级验证错误提供自定义的可视反馈 ，也可以使用默认的错误指示器。You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by setting the property, or you can use the default error indicator. 若要创建自定义验证规则，请创建一个派生自类的类 并实现 方法。To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the class and implement the method. 将自定义验证规则添加到 集合。Add the custom validation rule to the collection. ## 自定义 DataGrid 控件Customizing the DataGrid Control 控件支持公用表格式设置选项，如交替行背景和显示或隐藏标题、网格线和滚动条的功能。The control supports common table formatting options, such as alternating row backgrounds and the ability to show or hide headers, gridlines, and scroll bars. 此外，控件提供了若干样式和模板属性，您可以使用这些属性来完全更改控件及其行、列、标题和单元格的外观。Additionally, the control provides several style and template properties that you can use to completely change the appearance of the control and its rows, columns, headers, and cells. 若要自定义 行为，可处理选定内容更改、单元格编辑和列重新排序的事件。To customize behavior, you can handle events for selection change, cell editing, and column re-ordering. 还公开了若干行回收事件，您可以处理这些事件来自定义行。The also exposes several events for row recycling that you can handle to customize rows. 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [DataGrid 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/datagrid-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DataGrid Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/datagrid-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## 常见任务Common Tasks 下表提供了有关通常与相关联的任务的信息 。The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the . |任务Task|实现Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |设置交替行背景色Set alternating row background colors|将 属性设置为2或更大，然后将分配给 和 属性。Set the property to 2 or more, and then assign a to the and properties.| |定义单元格和行选择行为Define cell and row selection behavior|设置 和 属性。Set the and properties.| |自定义标题、单元和行的视觉外观Customize the visual appearance of headers, cells and rows|将新的应用于 、 、 或 属性。Apply a new to the , , , or properties.| |设置大小调整选项Set sizing options|设置 、、 、 、 或 属性。Set the , , , , , or properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [DataGrid 控件中的调整大小选项](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/sizing-options-in-the-datagrid-control)。For more information, see [Sizing Options in the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/sizing-options-in-the-datagrid-control).| |访问选定项Access selected items|检查 属性以获取选定的单元格，并选中 属性以获取选定的行。Check the property to get the selected cells and check the property to get the selected rows. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.| |自定义最终用户交互Customize end-user interactions|设置 、、 、 、 和 属性。Set the , , , , , and properties.| |取消或更改自动生成的列Cancel or change auto-generated columns|处理 事件。Handle the event.| |冻结列Freeze a column|将 属性设置为1，并将该属性设置为0，将该列移到最左侧的位置 。Set the property to 1 and move the column to the left-most position by setting the property to 0.| |使用 XML 数据作为数据源Use XML data as the data source|将 上的绑定 到表示项集合的 XPath 查询。Bind the on the to the XPath query representing the collection of items. 在中创建每个列 。Create each column in the . 绑定每一列，方法是将绑定上的 XPath 设置为可获取项源属性的查询。Bind each column by setting the XPath on the binding to the query that gets the property on the item source. 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .| |将项分组Group items|绑定到 支持分组的或。Bind to a or that supports grouping. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 DataGrid 控件中对数据进行分组、排序和筛选](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control)。For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control).| |显示行的详细信息部分Display the details section for a row|定义 以指定详细信息部分的外观。Define a to specify the appearance of the details section. 设置 以指定显示详细信息部分的时间。Set the to specify when the details section is shown. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：向 DataGrid 控件添加行详细](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control)信息。For more information, see [How to: Add Row Details to a DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control).| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定 到 并使用列自动生成。The following example shows how to bind a to a and use column auto-generation. 通过使用的方法进行填充 。The is populated by using the method of a from a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [创建数据集](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataset) 和 [从 DataAdapter 填充数据集](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter)。For more information, see [Creating a DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataset) and [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter). 若要使用适用于 Visual Studio 的 WPF 设计器，请参阅将 [wpf 控件绑定到 Visual studio 中的数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/bind-wpf-controls-to-data-in-visual-studio)。To use the WPF Designer for Visual Studio, see [Bind WPF controls to data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/bind-wpf-controls-to-data-in-visual-studio). remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和 属性共同确定每行背景的外观。The , , and properties together determine the appearance of each row's background. 如果 小于2，则将属性设置 为2。If is less than 2, setting the property sets to 2. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置中的交替行背景色 。The following example shows how to set alternating row background colors on the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合可以添加列、删除列或更新列的属性。Use the collection to add columns, remove columns, or update properties on the columns. > [!NOTE] > 列在集合中的顺序并不确定它们在中的显示顺序 。The order of columns in the collection does not determine the order that they will appear in the . 属性确定列的顺序。The property determines the column order. 集合中的每一列都 定义中的列 。Each column in the collection defines a column in the . 下表列出了提供的四种列类型 。The following table lists the four column types that the provides. |列类型Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| ||用于显示布尔数据。Use to display Boolean data.| 此外，您还可以通过使用定义您自己的自定义列 。In addition, you can define your own custom column by using . 集合中的列必须派生自 。Columns in the collection must derive from . 请注意 ，添加对绑定的支持，派生自， 并且是多个已定义列类型的基础。Note that , which adds support for binding, derives from and is the base for several of the defined column types. 集合中的所有列都使用 定义的属性 。All columns in the collection use the property defined by the . 您可以 在运行时修改集合，而不管它是否包含生成的列。You can modify the collection at run time regardless of whether it contains generated columns. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将列添加到集合中。The following example shows how to add a column to the collection. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#DataGrid2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml#datagrid2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Add1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml.cs#add1)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Add1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/vb/datagrid_columnsmanipulation_vb/window1.xaml.vb#add1)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Add2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml.cs#add2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Add2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/vb/datagrid_columnsmanipulation_vb/window1.xaml.vb#add2)] 下面的示例演示如何从集合中移除列。The following example shows how to remove a column from the collection. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Delete](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml#delete)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#DataGrid](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml#datagrid)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Delete2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/cs/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/window1.xaml.cs#delete2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_ColumnsManipulation#Delete2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_columnsmanipulation/vb/datagrid_columnsmanipulation_vb/window1.xaml.vb#delete2)] 下面的示例演示如何在集合中的列自动生成和发生事件时设置其属性。The following example shows how to set properties on columns in the collection when they are auto-generated and when an event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了提高性能， 默认情况下，属性设置为 `true` 。To improve performance, the property is set to `true` by default. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，不 会 为绑定数据源中的每个数据项实例化对象。When the property is set to `true`, the does not instantiate a object for each data item in the bound data source. 相反， 仅在需要时才会创建对象，并尽可能多地重用它们。Instead, the creates objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can. 例如，将 为当前处于视图中的每个数据项创建一个对象，并在滚动时回收该行。For example, the creates a object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 冻结列是始终显示的列，不能滚动到可见性。Frozen columns are columns that are always displayed and cannot be scrolled out of visibility. 冻结列的显示顺序始终是最左侧的列。Frozen columns are always the leftmost columns in display order. 不能将冻结的列拖入未冻结的列组，也不能将未冻结的列拖到冻结列组中。You cannot drag frozen columns into the group of unfrozen columns or drag unfrozen columns into the group of frozen columns. 若要冻结列，请设置 属性。To freeze columns, set the property. 该数字指定的最左边的列 将变为冻结。The leftmost columns specified by the number will become frozen. 例如，如果将设置 为2，则会冻结显示中的两列。For example, if you set the to 2, the two left columns in the display are frozen. 若要确定某一列是否已冻结，请检查 上的属性 。To determine whether a column is already frozen, check the property on the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在从中选择 "冻结列" 时使列冻结 。The following example shows how to make a column frozen when "Freeze Column" is selected from the . 列将向左移动，以便包含在冻结列中。Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#3)]

The collection of columns for the properties of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据网格中的每一行都绑定到数据源中的某个对象，数据网格中的每一列都绑定到该数据对象的属性。Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object. 此方法为每个属性生成一个包含列的集合。This method generates a collection that contains a column for each property. 调用 方法可提供与将属性设置为相同的功能 `true` 。Calling the method provides the same functionality as setting the property to `true`. 通常不会从代码中调用此方法。You will typically not call this method from your code. 提供此方法是为了使设计器工具能够生成一组列，用户可以编辑这些列，然后将这些列放入数据网格中。This method is provided to enable designer tools to generate a collection of columns that can be edited by the user and then placed into the data grid. 设计器工具可以使用 方法返回自动生成的列的集合。A designer tool can use the method to return a collection of auto-generated columns. 然后，设计器工具可以提供一个用户界面，使用户能够编辑列类型，并根据需要添加或删除列。The designer tool can then provide a user interface to enable the user to edit the column types, and add or remove columns as necessary. 然后，可以 通过将每列添加到集合中，使用列集合来填充数据网格的集合。The column collection can then be used to populate the collection of the data grid by adding each column to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以 通过添加行详细信息部分自定义中的数据呈现。You can customize the data presentation in the by adding a row details section. 通过添加行详细信息部分，可以对模板中的某些数据进行分组（可选择可见或折叠）。Adding a row details section enables you to group some data in a template that is optionally visible or collapsed. 将行详细信息模板定义为内联 XAML 或资源。You define the row details template as either inline XAML or as a resource. 作为资源添加的数据模板可在整个项目中使用，而无需重新创建模板。A data template that is added as a resource can be used throughout the project without re-creating the template. 添加为内联 XAML 的数据模板只能从定义它的控件进行访问。A data template that is added as inline XAML is only accessible from the control where it is defined. 可以 通过处理事件来修改它 。You can modify the before it is displayed by handling the event. 应处理 事件，以撤消加载行详细信息时所做的更改。You should handle the event to undo changes that are made while loading the row details. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 具有定义的 内联的。The following example shows a with a defined inline. 在 每行中显示三个值，在选择行时在详细信息部分中显示另外三个值。The displays three values in each row and three more values in the details section when the row is selected. 此示例摘自 [如何：向 DataGrid 控件添加行详细信息](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control) 中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in the [How to: Add Row Details to a DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control) topic. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_RowDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_rowdetails/cs/mainwindow.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使您可以在单元和行级别执行验证。The control enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level. 使用单元格级验证时，可以在用户更新值时验证绑定数据对象的各个属性。With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value. 通过行级验证，用户将更改提交到行时，可以验证整个数据对象。With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row. 您可以通过指定 定义错误指示器外观的来为行级验证错误提供自定义的视觉反馈。You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by specifying a that defines the appearance of the error indicator. 将 属性设置为 `null` 以使用默认错误指示器。Set the property to `null` to use the default error indicator. ## Examples 下面的示例将默认行验证反馈替换为更直观的指示器。The following example replaces the default row validation feedback with a more visible indicator. 如果用户输入的值无效，则行标题中将显示一个带有白色感叹号的红色圆圈。When a user enters an invalid value, a red circle with a white exclamation mark appears in the row header. 关联的错误消息将显示在工具提示中。The associated error message is displayed in a ToolTip. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例，其中提供了 [如何：通过 DataGrid 控件实现验证](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-implement-validation-with-the-datagrid-control) 主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Implement Validation with the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-implement-validation-with-the-datagrid-control) topic. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_Validation#RowValidationFeedbackXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_validation/cs/mainwindow.xaml#rowvalidationfeedbackxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使您可以在单元和行级别执行验证。The control enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level. 使用单元格级验证时，可以在用户更新值时验证绑定数据对象的各个属性。With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value. 通过行级验证，用户将更改提交到行时，可以验证整个数据对象。With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row. 若要创建自定义验证规则，请创建一个派生自类的类 并实现 方法。To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the class and implement the method. 将自定义验证规则添加到 集合。Add the custom validation rule to the collection. 如果 使用属性，则 忽略属性。If the property is used, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 ，它检查 `StartDate` 对象的属性值是否 `Course` 早于其 `EndDate` 属性值。The following example demonstrates a that checks whether the `StartDate` property value for a `Course` object is earlier than its `EndDate` property value. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例，其中提供了 [如何：通过 DataGrid 控件实现验证](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-implement-validation-with-the-datagrid-control) 主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Implement Validation with the DataGrid Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-implement-validation-with-the-datagrid-control) topic. [!code-csharp[DataGrid_Validation#CourseValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_validation/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#coursevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_Validation#CourseValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_validation/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#coursevalidationrule)] 下面的示例 在 XAML 中设置属性。The following example sets the property in XAML. 属性设置为， 以便仅在更新绑定数据对象后进行验证。The property is set to so that the validation occurs only after the bound data object is updated. 如果用户指定的结束日期早于开始日期，则行标题中会出现红色感叹号 (！ ) 。When a user specifies an end date that is earlier than the start date, a red exclamation mark (!) appears in the row header. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_Validation#RowValidationRulesXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_validation/cs/mainwindow.xaml#rowvalidationrulesxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有三种选择模式 。There are three selection modes for . 选择模式是用属性设置的 。The selection mode is set with the property. 根据 ， 或 将包含下表中定义的选定项的集合。Depending on the , or will contain a collection of selected items as defined in the following table. | 值 value| 值 value| 值 value| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||选定单元格的集合Collection of selected cells|空Empty| ||所选行中单元格的集合Collection of cells in the selected rows|所选行的集合Collection of selected rows| ||选定单元格的集合，包括选定行中的所有单元格Collection of selected cells, including all cells in a selected row|选定行的集合; 如果未选择任何行，则为空Collection of selected rows or empty if no full rows are selected| 选定单元格后，将 引发事件，并将该 属性设置为 `true` ，并将该单元格添加到 集合中。When a cell is selected, the event is raised, the property is set to `true`, and the cell is added to the collection. 选择行后，将 引发事件，并将该 属性设置为 `true` ，并将该行添加到 集合中。When a row is selected, the event is raised, the property is set to `true`, and the row is added to the collection. 当所选内容发生更改时， 如果新的或旧的选定内容包含行，则会引发和事件。When the selection changes, the and events are raised if the new or old selection contains a row. 如果新的或旧的选定内容只包含单元，则不会引发事件。The event is not raised if the new or old selection contains only cells.

summary.span: 当 对象变得可供重用时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a object becomes available for reuse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了提高性能， 默认情况下，属性设置为 `true` 。To improve performance, the property is set to `true` by default. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，不 会 为绑定数据源中的每个数据项实例化对象。When the property is set to `true`, the does not instantiate a object for each data item in the bound data source. 相反， 仅在需要时才会创建对象，并尽可能多地重用它们。Instead, the creates objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can. 例如，将 为当前处于视图中的每个数据项创建一个对象，并在滚动时回收该行。For example, the creates a object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view. 此事件使您能够在重复使用行之前对该行进行任何必要的更改。This event enables you to make any necessary changes to a row before it is reused. 通常使用此事件来撤消在事件处理程序中进行的任何更改 。You typically use this event to undo any changes that were made in a event handler.

Public Event UnloadingRowDetails As EventHandler(Of DataGridRowDetailsEventArgs)

summary.span: 当行详细信息元素变得可供重用时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a row details element becomes available for reuse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于应用了新行详细信息模板或删除了其行详细信息模板的每个行，此事件会出现一次。This event occurs one time for each row to which a new row details template is applied or for which a row details template is removed. 在以下任一情况下，将应用或删除新的详细信息模板：A new details template is applied or removed in one of the following cases: - Row 属性值将更改。The row property value changes. - Row 属性值为 `null` ， 属性值将更改。The row property value is `null` and the property value changes. 此事件使您能够在重复使用行详细信息元素之前对其进行任何必要的更改。This event enables you to make any necessary changes to the row details element before it is reused. 通常会使用此事件来撤消在事件处理程序中进行的任何更改 。You will typically use this event to undo any changes that were made in a event handler.
